info.description:
Complete API collection for Invest-igator application. Includes tRPC endpoints and Better Auth authentication.

## Setup
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Create an environment with these variables:
   - `baseUrl`: Your API base URL (e.g., http://localhost:3000 or https://yourdomain.com)
   - `authToken`: Session token (obtained after login)
   - `apiKey`: API key for programmatic access (optional)

## Authentication
- Most endpoints require authentication via session cookie or API key
- Use Better Auth login endpoints first to obtain a session
- tRPC endpoints use POST method to `/api/trpc/{router}.{procedure}`

## Usage
- All tRPC inputs are sent as JSON in the request body
- Response format is JSON
- Check individual request descriptions for required inputs and expected responses
info.name: Invest-igator API

item.description: Authentication operations - signup, login, password reset. All endpoints are public.

request.description:
Create a new user account with email and password.

Required fields:
- email: Valid email address
- password: Minimum 1 character
- name: User's full name

Optional:
- confirmPassword: Accepted but ignored

Body format: {"0": {"json": {object}}}
Query param: batch=1
Returns: {ok: true}

Reset password using a valid token from email.

Required:
- token: Password reset token (min 10 chars)
- password: New password (min 8, max 200 chars)

Returns: {ok: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1
Sign in with email and password using Better Auth. Sets session cookie on success.
Sign out and clear session cookie.

item.name: Auth

item.description: User account management - profile, passwords, 2FA, email changes, OAuth connections. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Get current user profile information.

Returns:
- id: User ID
- email: Email address
- name: User name
- avatar: Profile picture URL (nullable)
- emailVerified: Whether email is verified
- hasPassword: Whether user has password set

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Update user profile name and avatar.

Required:
- name: User name (1-100 chars)

Optional:
- image: Avatar URL or empty string to remove

Returns: {ok: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Change password (credential accounts only).

Required:
- currentPassword: Current password
- newPassword: New password (8-200 chars)

Returns: {ok: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Get two-factor authentication state.

Returns:
- enabled: Boolean
- pending: Boolean
- hasSecret: Boolean
- hasPassword: Boolean
- recoveryCodesRemaining: Number
- confirmedAt: ISO date or null

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Request email change. Requires current password if set.

Required:
- newEmail: New email address

Optional:
- currentPassword: Required if password is set

Returns: {ok: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: Account

item.description: Watchlist management with market data from InfluxDB. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Add a symbol to watchlist. Triggers background data ingestion.

Required:
- symbol: Stock symbol

Optional:
- displaySymbol: Display name
- description: Description
- type: Security type

Returns: Created item or {alreadyExists: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Get all watchlist items for current user.

Returns: Array of watchlist items with symbol, displaySymbol, description, type, starred, createdAt

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Search for symbols via Finnhub API.

Required:
- query: Search query string

Returns: Array of search results

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Get historical price data from InfluxDB.

Optional:
- symbols: Array of symbols (default: user's starred/recent)
- days: Lookback period (default: 365, min: 1)

Returns: Object keyed by symbol with arrays of {date, close} points

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Get corporate events (dividends, splits, capital gains).

Optional:
- symbols: Array of symbols (default: user's starred/recent)
- days: Lookback period (default: 365, min: 1)

Returns: Object keyed by symbol with dividends, splits, capitalGains arrays

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: Watchlist

item.description: Investment transaction management with CSV import/export. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Create a new transaction.

Required:
- date: ISO date string
- type: BUY, SELL, DIVIDEND, FEE, etc.
- symbol: Stock symbol
- quantity: Number (can be negative for sells)
- price: Unit price
- currency: Currency code

Optional:
- fees: Transaction fees
- notes: Additional notes

Returns: Created transaction object

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

List transactions with filters and pagination.

Optional:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- pageSize: Items per page (default: 50, max: 100)
- symbol: Filter by symbol
- type: Filter by transaction type
- from: Start date (ISO)
- to: End date (ISO)

Returns: {items: Transaction[], total: number, page: number, pageSize: number}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Update an existing transaction.

Required:
- id: Transaction ID

Optional: Any transaction fields to update

Returns: Updated transaction object

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Import transactions from CSV with duplicate detection.

Required:
- csvContent: CSV string

Optional:
- skipDuplicates: Skip duplicate transactions (default: true)

Returns: {imported: number, skipped: number, errors: string[]}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Export transactions to CSV.

Optional:
- from: Start date (ISO)
- to: End date (ISO)
- symbol: Filter by symbol

Returns: {csvContent: string}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Check for duplicate transactions before import.

Required:
- csvContent: CSV string

Returns: Array of duplicate transactions

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: Transactions

item.description: Portfolio analytics and performance calculations. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Get current portfolio holdings with weights and values.

Optional:
- currency: Target currency (default: USD)

Returns: Array of holdings with symbol, quantity, currentPrice, value, weight, costBasis

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Calculate portfolio performance metrics (TWR/MWR).

Required:
- from: Start date (ISO yyyy-mm-dd)
- to: End date (ISO yyyy-mm-dd)

Optional:
- currency: Target currency (default: USD)

Returns:
- points: Daily {date, netAssets, yieldTwr, yieldMwr}
- totalReturnTwr: Total TWR (%)
- totalReturnMwr: Total MWR (%)
- prevDayReturnTwr: Previous day TWR change (%)
- prevDayReturnMwr: Previous day MWR change (%)

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: Portfolio

item.description: Financial goals tracking and management. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Create a new financial goal.

Required:
- name: Goal name
- targetAmount: Target amount
- currency: Currency code
- targetDate: Target date (ISO)

Optional:
- description: Goal description

Returns: Created goal object

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

List all user goals.

Returns: Array of goal objects with name, targetAmount, currency, targetDate, currentAmount, progress

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Update goal details.

Required:
- id: Goal ID

Optional: Any goal fields to update

Returns: Updated goal object

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: Goals

item.description: API key management for programmatic access. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Create new API key with optional expiration, rate limits, and permissions.

Required:
- name: Key name

Optional:
- expiresAt: Expiration date (ISO)
- permissions: Permission object
- rateLimit: Rate limit per hour

Returns: {key: string, ...metadata} (key shown only once)

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

List all user's API keys (without actual key values).

Returns: Array of API key metadata objects

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Get specific API key details.

Required:
- id: API key ID

Returns: API key metadata object

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Update API key settings.

Required:
- id: API key ID

Optional: Fields to update

Returns: Updated API key metadata

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: API Keys

item.description: Admin-only procedures for user management and statistics. Requires admin or superadmin role.

request.description:
List users with search and pagination.

Optional:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- perPage: Items per page (default: 50, max: 100)
- search: Search by email or name
- sortBy: Sort field (email, name, role, createdAt)
- sortDir: Sort direction (asc, desc)

Returns: {users: User[], total: number, page: number, perPage: number}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Set user role (admin/user). Only superadmin can set superadmin role.

Required:
- userId: User ID
- role: New role (user, admin, superadmin)

Returns: {ok: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Ban a user. Admins can ban regular users, only superadmins can ban admins.

Required:
- userId: User ID

Optional:
- banReason: Reason for ban

Returns: {ok: true}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

Get admin dashboard statistics.

Returns: Object with user counts, activity metrics, etc.

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

List audit logs with filters.

Optional:
- page: Page number
- perPage: Items per page
- action: Filter by action type
- from: Start date
- to: End date

Returns: {logs: AuditLog[], total: number}

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: Admin

item.description: User currency preference management. All procedures require authentication.
item.name: Currency

item.description: User theme (light/dark mode) preferences. All procedures require authentication.

item.description: Foreign exchange rate data. All procedures require authentication.

request.description:
Get foreign exchange conversion rates matrix.

Returns: Object with conversion rates between supported currencies

Body format: {"0": {"json": <input>}}
Query param: batch=1

item.name: FX
